scene: 3 AM Hospital Room - The Crisis Moment
prompt: Photorealistic image of an exhausted new father in his early 30s sitting in a dim hospital room at 3 AM, soft warm lighting from a bedside lamp, holding a sleeping newborn baby wrapped in a white hospital blanket. Close-up shot showing both tenderness and anxiety on the father's face - tired eyes with dark circles, gentle smile mixed with worry lines on forehead. Hospital room background slightly blurred with medical equipment barely visible. Warm color tones with soft shadows. Emotional, intimate moment.
